statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 2000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_date) = 8 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_date) = 2021;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'insert' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 'abc123';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN audit_logs ON transactions.transaction_id = audit_logs.transaction_id WHERE audit_logs.action = 'approved';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT sender_account_id, receiver_account_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_account_id, receiver_account_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE action='Transfer' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT investigation_id, investigation_timestamp, reason FROM investigation_data;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_account_id, receiver_account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp FROM transactions WHERE sender_account_id = 1001;
SELECT t.transaction_id, a.action, i.reason FROM transactions t JOIN audit_log a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id JOIN investigation_data i ON t.transaction_id = i.transaction_id;
SELECT investigation_id, transaction_id, reason, investigator_name FROM investigation_data WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_id, location FROM merchants WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT t.*, u.username FROM transactions t INNER JOIN users u ON t.transaction_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY u.username ASC, t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, m.merchant_name, t.amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN merchants m ON t.transaction_id = m.merchant_id WHERE t.amount < 50 ORDER BY m.location DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_date, tl.log_description, u.email FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transaction_logs tl ON t.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id INNER JOIN users u ON tl.user_id = u.user_id WHERE tl.log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC, tl.log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_details;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_number, balance FROM account_details WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_details WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, timestamp FROM transaction_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_number, balance FROM account_details WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_details WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT log_id, log_details, timestamp FROM transaction_log ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE action_performed LIKE '%delete%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
